\w And|strong="H1697"\w* \w he|strong="H0559"\w* \w taught|strong="H3384"\w* \w me|strong="H8104"\w*, \w and|strong="H1697"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: Let thy \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* receive \w my|strong="H8104"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w*, \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* \w my|strong="H8104"\w* \w commandments|strong="H4687"\w*, \w and|strong="H1697"\w* thou shalt \w live|strong="H2421"\w*.

\w Get|strong="H7069"\w* \w wisdom|strong="H2451"\w*, \w get|strong="H7069"\w* prudence: \w forget|strong="H7911"\w* \w not|strong="H0408"\w*, \w neither|strong="H0408"\w* \w decline|strong="H5186"\w* from \w the|strong="H7911"\w* \w words|strong="H0561"\w* \w of|strong="H6310"\w* \w my|strong="H5186"\w* \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3605"\w* \w beginning|strong="H7225"\w* \w of|strong="H3605"\w* \w wisdom|strong="H2451"\w*, \w get|strong="H7069"\w* \w wisdom|strong="H2451"\w*, \w and|strong="H2451"\w* \w with|strong="H3605"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* thy possession \w purchase|strong="H7069"\w* prudence.

\w Take|strong="H7311"\w* hold \w on|strong="H3513"\w* \w her|strong="H3588"\w*, \w and|strong="H7311"\w* \w she|strong="H3588"\w* shall \w exalt|strong="H7311"\w* thee: thou shalt \w be|strong="H7311"\w* \w glorified|strong="H3513"\w* \w by|strong="H3588"\w* \w her|strong="H3588"\w*, \w when|strong="H3588"\w* thou shalt \w embrace|strong="H2263"\w* \w her|strong="H3588"\w*.

She \w shall|strong="H7218"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H5414"\w* thy \w head|strong="H7218"\w* increase \w of|strong="H7218"\w* graces, \w and|strong="H7218"\w* protect thee \w with|strong="H7218"\w* \w a|strong="H5414"\w* noble \w crown|strong="H5850"\w*.

\w Hear|strong="H8085"\w*, \w O|strong="H8085"\w* \w my|strong="H8085"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w receive|strong="H3947"\w* \w my|strong="H8085"\w* \w words|strong="H0561"\w*, \w that|strong="H8085"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w life|strong="H2416"\w* \w may|strong="H1121"\w* \w be|strong="H1121"\w* \w multiplied|strong="H7235"\w* \w to|strong="H8085"\w* thee.

\w I|strong="H1870"\w* \w will|strong="H2451"\w* shew thee \w the|strong="H1870"\w* \w way|strong="H1870"\w* \w of|strong="H1870"\w* \w wisdom|strong="H2451"\w*, \w I|strong="H1870"\w* \w will|strong="H2451"\w* \w lead|strong="H1869"\w* thee \w by|strong="H1870"\w* \w the|strong="H1870"\w* \w paths|strong="H4570"\w* \w of|strong="H1870"\w* equity:

Which \w when|strong="H0518"\w* thou shalt \w have|strong="H0518"\w* entered, thy \w steps|strong="H6806"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* straitened, \w and|strong="H7323"\w* \w when|strong="H0518"\w* thou runnest thou shalt \w not|strong="H3808"\w* meet \w a|strong="H0518"\w* stumblingblock.

\w Take|strong="H2388"\w* \w hold|strong="H2388"\w* on \w instruction|strong="H4148"\w*, \w leave|strong="H7503"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w not|strong="H0408"\w*: \w keep|strong="H5341"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w*, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* thy \w life|strong="H2416"\w*.

\w Be|strong="H0408"\w* \w not|strong="H0408"\w* delighted \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0935"\w* \w paths|strong="H0734"\w* \w of|strong="H1870"\w* \w the|strong="H0935"\w* \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w*, \w neither|strong="H0408"\w* \w let|strong="H0408"\w* \w the|strong="H0935"\w* \w way|strong="H1870"\w* \w of|strong="H1870"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \w men|strong="H7563"\w* please thee.

Flee \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w*, \w pass|strong="H5674"\w* \w not|strong="H0408"\w* \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w*: \w go|strong="H5674"\w* \w aside|strong="H7847"\w*, \w and|strong="H7847"\w* forsake \w it|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w sleep|strong="H8142"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w except|strong="H0518"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H0518"\w* done \w evil|strong="H7489"\w*: \w and|strong="H3782"\w* \w their|strong="H3588"\w* \w sleep|strong="H8142"\w* \w is|strong="H3808"\w* \w taken|strong="H1497"\w* \w away|strong="H1497"\w* \w unless|strong="H0518"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H0518"\w* made some \w to|strong="H3808"\w* \w fall|strong="H3782"\w*.

\w They|strong="H3588"\w* \w eat|strong="H3898"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* \w of|strong="H3899"\w* \w wickedness|strong="H7562"\w*, \w and|strong="H3899"\w* \w drink|strong="H8354"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w wine|strong="H3196"\w* \w of|strong="H3899"\w* iniquity.

\w But|strong="H6662"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* \w path|strong="H0734"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* \w just|strong="H6662"\w*, \w as|strong="H5704"\w* \w a|strong="H5704"\w* \w shining|strong="H0216"\w* \w light|strong="H0216"\w*, goeth forwards \w and|strong="H1980"\w* increaseth \w even|strong="H5704"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* perfect \w day|strong="H3117"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3045"\w* \w way|strong="H1870"\w* \w of|strong="H1870"\w* \w the|strong="H3045"\w* \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* \w is|strong="H4100"\w* darksome: \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w where|strong="H4100"\w* \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w fall|strong="H3782"\w*.

\w My|strong="H5186"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, hearken \w to|strong="H1697"\w* \w my|strong="H5186"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w incline|strong="H5186"\w* thy \w ear|strong="H0241"\w* \w to|strong="H1697"\w* \w my|strong="H5186"\w* \w sayings|strong="H0561"\w*.

\w Let|strong="H0408"\w* \w them|strong="H8432"\w* \w not|strong="H0408"\w* \w depart|strong="H3868"\w* \w from|strong="H8432"\w* thy \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*, \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* \w them|strong="H8432"\w* \w in|strong="H8432"\w* \w the|strong="H8432"\w* \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* \w of|strong="H5869"\w* thy \w heart|strong="H3824"\w*:

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w are|strong="H1992"\w* \w life|strong="H2416"\w* \w to|strong="H1320"\w* \w those|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w find|strong="H4672"\w* \w them|strong="H1992"\w*, \w and|strong="H1320"\w* \w health|strong="H4832"\w* \w to|strong="H1320"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w*.

\w With|strong="H3605"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* watchfulness \w keep|strong="H5341"\w* thy \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w life|strong="H2416"\w* issueth \w out|strong="H4480"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w*.

\w Remove|strong="H5493"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* thee \w a|strong="H4480"\w* froward \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w*, \w and|strong="H6310"\w* let detracting \w lips|strong="H8193"\w* \w be|strong="H4480"\w* \w far|strong="H7368"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* thee.

\w Let|strong="H6079"\w* thy \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* \w look|strong="H5027"\w* \w straight|strong="H3474"\w* \w on|strong="H5027"\w*, \w and|strong="H5869"\w* \w let|strong="H6079"\w* thy \w eyelids|strong="H6079"\w* go \w before|strong="H5048"\w* thy steps.

\w Make|strong="H3559"\w* straight \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w path|strong="H1870"\w* \w for|strong="H3605"\w* thy \w feet|strong="H7272"\w*, \w and|strong="H1870"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* thy \w ways|strong="H1870"\w* shall \w be|strong="H3605"\w* \w established|strong="H3559"\w*.

\w Decline|strong="H5186"\w* \w not|strong="H0408"\w* \w to|strong="H5493"\w* \w the|strong="H5493"\w* \w right|strong="H3225"\w* \w hand|strong="H3225"\w*, \w nor|strong="H0408"\w* \w to|strong="H5493"\w* \w the|strong="H5493"\w* \w left|strong="H8040"\w*: \w turn|strong="H5493"\w* \w away|strong="H5493"\w* thy \w foot|strong="H7272"\w* \w from|strong="H5493"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w*. \w For|strong="H7272"\w* \w the|strong="H5493"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3225"\w* knoweth \w the|strong="H5493"\w* ways \w that|strong="H7272"\w* \w are|strong="H7272"\w* \w on|strong="H7451"\w* \w the|strong="H5493"\w* \w right|strong="H3225"\w* \w hand|strong="H3225"\w*: \w but|strong="H3225"\w* those \w are|strong="H7272"\w* perverse which \w are|strong="H7272"\w* \w on|strong="H7451"\w* \w the|strong="H5493"\w* \w left|strong="H8040"\w* \w hand|strong="H3225"\w*. \w But|strong="H3225"\w* \w he|strong="H5186"\w* \w will|strong="H7272"\w* \w make|strong="H7272"\w* thy courses straight, \w he|strong="H5186"\w* \w will|strong="H7272"\w* \w bring|strong="H7451"\w* forward thy ways \w in|strong="H5493"\w* peace.
